verbose_text: No significant alterations in total P amount were observed between the putative new lpa1 mutant and the control : in fact, even if the new lpa1 mutation caused approximately an eight-fold increase in the amount of free phosphate, this was balanced by a reduction of phytic acid that was nearly halved in comparison to the wild type content (1.28mg/g and 3mg/g, respectively) (XREF_FIG).
